Topic.Title: Multiplayer and How to let the player choose their name

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!
I'm just curious.
Is it possible to create at least a 2-4 mutiplayer game?
And if so how is that done?
Also, I played this one game that was mutiplayer but, it asked the player what name would they liked to be called. How can I do that?

By the way, I read the tutorials so i know how to do the basic, intermediate, and advanced stuff. I just need to know if the questions I ask is possible.

Posts.EditableText: It's not possible to create multiplayergames with Quest5.
